formula: Convolution product of A000594 and A013973. - _Michael Somos_, Mar 18 2012
mathematica: (691/(1728*250))*(E4[x]*E14[x] - E6[x]*E12[x]) + O[x]^(terms+1) // CoefficientList[#, x]& // Rest (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 27 2018, after _Seiichi Manyama_ *)
program: (PARI)  {a(n) = if( n<0, 0, polcoeff( x * eta(x + x * O(x^n))^24 * (1 - 504 * sum( k=1, n, sigma( k, 5) * x^k)), n))}; /* _Michael Somos_, Mar 18 2012 */
